bibl.title: What is Hellenistic Law? The Documents of the Judean Desert in the Light of the Papyri from Egypt.
bibl.note: A revised version of this contribution has been published as: Greek Law in the Hellenistic Period: Family and Marriage, The Cambridge Companion to Ancient Greek Law (Cambridge, 2005) pp. 343-354. - Non vidimus.
bibl.seg: MODRZEJEWSKI (MÉLÈZE MODRZEJEWSKI) Joseph, What is Hellenistic Law? The Documents of the Judean Desert in the Light of the Papyri from Egypt.

A revised version of this contribution has been published as: Greek Law in the Hellenistic Period: Family and Marriage, The Cambridge Companion to Ancient Greek Law (Cambridge, 2005) pp. 343-354. - Non vidimus.
